Guest Speakers

In addition to our awesome faculty & staff, students learn from top tier guest speakers.

  • John Britton

    Hacker At-Large

    Awareness is not enough, I must understand. Five universities in four countries, I dropped out to start my own. World Traveling Vagabond.

    @johndbritton →

  • Sara Chipps

    CTO @levoleague

    I jam with the console cowboys in cyberspace. CTO @levoleague. Made @GirlDevelopIT and @perfect_basics. #levolove JS4life

    @SaraJChipps →

  • Jon Grover

    Artist

    A new media artist that creates interactive sculptures that translate touch and motion into sound, video, and light.

    @jongrover →

  • Zach Holman

    github

    Joined GitHub in 2010 as one of their first engineering hires. Initially working on what would become GitHub Enterprise.

    @holman →

  • Daniel Langevin

    CTO Lifebooker

    Software application developer with experience working with a wide variety of languages and platforms, building web-based applications.

    @dlangevin →

  • Ricky Robinett

    Hacker at @Ordrin

    Focused on creating fun and entertaining apps. My apps have been used by hundreds of thousands of users and covered in the press.

    @rickyrobinett →
